body:
Comment 3: 
I looked at the code and now I understand that by "An Info.Objects map would do" you
meant it would do to use such a map internally to EvalNode.  I guess Config.CheckExpr
would be overkill because the options on Config aren't relevant to checking a lonely
expression (except maybe FakeImportC).  It would make more sense to add an Info
parameter to EvalNode.

A better name would still be CheckExpr.
